word: Experienced, God-fearing, Proved Men--Positions have been given to young, inexperienced men, which ought to have been given to men who had an experience gained in the early history of the work.  Let positions of trust be given to experienced, God-fearing, proved men, men who will bear the message of reproof sent by God.--Letter 35, 1900, p. 1 (Feb. 13, 1900, to General Conference Committee).
